title: Curated list of awesome Mastodon-related stuff
author: j0k3r
content: readme.md awesome mastodon curated list mastodon-related stuff!table contentdocumentationclientstoolsuser stylesuser scriptsbotsnews & magazines botsassociatonsblogslibrairiesdocumentation i wish knew before joining mastodon - introduction mastodon.wiki - mastodon community wiki.clientstusky - android client.tootyfruity - android app mastodon.twidere - android app twitter, gnu social mastodon.tooty - experimental multi-account mastodon web client written elm.mustor - ios app mastodon.toot - mastodon cli client (python).madonctl - mastodon cli client ().naumanni - web user interface specially designed mastodon.toolsmastodon instances - list mastodon instances.mastodon bridge - find twitter friends the federated mastodon network. long your friends signed here both accounts, can find .unmung.com/mastoview - preview local federated timeline any instance.toot scheduler - schedule , toot later!mastodon network monitoring (mnm) - track display browsable stats the mastodon network.radar - project map the fediverse.user stylesvariable width - makes mastodon scale the browser's width.narrow drawer - the variable width style, makes drawer narrower the columns scale accordingly.user scriptsnsfw remover - automatically display nsfw images.customizable interface - move resize columns a grid.botsfeed2toot - automatically parses rss feeds, identifies posts posts on mastodon (python).usercount - bot posts user statistics mastodon (python).autofollow - autofollow bot mastodon (python).hnbot - posts hacker news stories 100+ points (python).translator - translate toot the desired language using @translator@toot.works [langcode].@trendingbot@mastodon.social - shows what's trending mastodon.boost - automatically boosts toots users (python)news & magazines botsplease note: of are non-official. , we not recommend , they are listed here your information.english@arstechnica@social.undernet.uy -
